body:
You should fix with:

(function(){

    'use strict';
    angular
        .module('myAppName')
        .controller('MyController', MyController);

    function MyController(){

     . . .
    }

})();

Passing again [] to your app or specifying the module like module1 won't work.

Of course, you need to initialize your app modules on a separated JS

(function(){
    'use strict';
    angular.module('myAppName', [ modules . . . ]);
})();
title: Controller is not defined if added to separate file for dialog window in angular material
